content: What a hypocrite, Judd. You take Mr. Trump’s words as factual when you are able to skew them to fit your narrative You do not believe his words when you are able to skew them to fit your narrative. This is the “problem” with the Media and for those who try to add their “2 cents”, you add misguided information that misinforms and distracts from true issues. You were part of the group that was instrumental in getting Mr. Trump elected. I hope you sleep well.
